# Rspotify

This package allows R to access Spotify's API to interact with their data.

Please access https://developer.spotify.com/web-api/
to get access to the API to receive your app_id and app_secret ensure the REDIRECT URI includes the trailing / e.g. http://localhost:1410/

## Getting Started

To install from github, please install the devtools package and and then run devtools::install_github("tiagomendesdantas/Rspotify")

### Importante Note

Be aware that this package is its very initial phase. Use with caution.
